languages.text: "Как вам угодно, Звездное Сиятельство. Но от рока невозможно убежать". {n}Старик пожимает плечами, отчего старые аугменты надрывно скрипят.{/n}
"As Your Celestial Highness desires. However, there is no escaping your fate." {n}The old man shrugs, his worn augmetics creaking.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Как вам угодно, Звездное Сиятельство. Но от рока невозможно убежать". {n}Старик пожимает плечами, отчего старые аугменты надрывно скрипят.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "As Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} desires. However, there is no escaping your fate." {n}The old man shrugs, his worn augmetics creaking.{/n}
"As Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} desires. However, there is no escaping your fate." {n}The old man shrugs, his worn augmetics creaking.{/n}

"As Your Celestial Highness desires. However, there is no escaping your fate." {n}The old man shrugs, his worn augmetics creaking.{/n}
"As Your Celestial Highness desires. However, there is no escaping your fate." {n}The old man shrugs, his worn augmetics creaking.{/n}

languages.text: “如您所愿，来自上界的大人，但没人能逃过命运的安排。”{n}老人耸了耸肩，早已磨损的植入物咯吱作响。{/n}
languages.original_text: "As Your Celestial Highness desires. However, there is no escaping your fate." {n}The old man shrugs, his worn augmetics creaking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “如您所愿，来自上界的大人，但没人能逃过命运的安排。”{n}老人耸了耸肩，早已磨损的植入物咯吱作响。{/n}

languages.text: «Como desee Su Excelencia Celestial. No obstante, es imposible eludir el destino». {n}El anciano se encoge de hombros con un chasquido de sus desgastados auméticos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As Your Celestial Highness desires. However, there is no escaping your fate." {n}The old man shrugs, his worn augmetics creaking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Como desee Su Excelencia Celestial. No obstante, es imposible eludir el destino». {n}El anciano se encoge de hombros con un chasquido de sus desgastados auméticos.{/n}

languages.text: "Semavi Efendimiz nasıl arzu ederse. Ancak kaderden kaçış yoktur." {n}Yaşlı adam omuz silkiyor, aşınmış ogmetikleri gıcırdıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As Your Celestial Highness desires. However, there is no escaping your fate." {n}The old man shrugs, his worn augmetics creaking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Semavi Efendimiz nasıl arzu ederse. Ancak kaderden kaçış yoktur." {n}Yaşlı adam omuz silkiyor, aşınmış ogmetikleri gıcırdıyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「天の閣下のお望み通りに…しかし、あなたの運命から逃れることはできません」{n}老人は肩をすくめ、彼の使い古されたオーグメティックが軋む。{/n}
languages.original_text: "As Your Celestial Highness desires. However, there is no escaping your fate." {n}The old man shrugs, his worn augmetics creaking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「天の閣下のお望み通りに…しかし、あなたの運命から逃れることはできません」{n}老人は肩をすくめ、彼の使い古されたオーグメティックが軋む。{/n}

languages.text: « Comme le désire Votre Altesse Célestissime. Mais vous ne pouvez échapper à votre destin. » {n}Le vieil homme hausse les épaules dans un craquement de ses augmétiques.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As Your Celestial Highness desires. However, there is no escaping your fate." {n}The old man shrugs, his worn augmetics creaking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Comme le désire Votre Altesse Célestissime. Mais vous ne pouvez échapper à votre destin. » {n}Le vieil homme hausse les épaules dans un craquement de ses augmétiques.{/n}

languages.text: "Wie Eure himmlische Hoheit wünschen. Aber Eurem Schicksal könnt Ihr nicht entkommen." {n}Der alte Mann zuckt mit den Schultern. Seine abgenutzten Augmentationen ächzen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As Your Celestial Highness desires. However, there is no escaping your fate." {n}The old man shrugs, his worn augmetics creaking.{/n}
